article: south korea 's prime minister suggested monday that his government has no plans to skip this summer 's opening ceremony of the olympics and said he hopes for a quick return to stability in china following its crackdown on tibetan protests .
abstract: south korean prime minister suggests his country will be at olympics ceremony
